about.heading: About Me
about.statement: Enthusiastic software engineer with 12+ years experience specializing in web applications

categorySkills.title: Programming
categorySkills.content: PHP, React, JavaScript/ES6, TypeScript, jQuery, SQL, Bash, LESS, SASS, HTML5

categorySkills.title: Frameworks
categorySkills.content: Concrete5, Lithium (li₃), Symfony, Doctrine, Wordpress, Bootstrap, Foundation

categorySkills.title: Software
categorySkills.content: Git, Node.js, Webpack, Grunt, Gulp, Composer, Photoshop, Illustrator, Linux, Windows

categorySkills.title: Processes
categorySkills.content: Code Reviews, TDD, Unit Testing, SEO, Multivariate Testing, Automation Scripting, Agile Methodology

qualities.heading: Qualities
list: Able to clearly translate technical details and quickly adapt to business priority changes
Talented at troubleshooting complex systems and composing technical documentation

education.heading: Education
accolades: Participated in Rotary Club and Computer Programming Club
Business Professionals of America 2006 National Competition – 1st Place in VB.NET

positions.title: Sr. Software Engineer
items: Leading the frontend website development team
Mentoring and pairing with other developers to help with tasks and promote best practices
Aligning technical direction through efforts such as moving code repositories to GitLab, simplifying deployment processes during PHP7 upgrade, and creating documentation when workflows change
Developing the website content management system used to promote online sales for our AntiVirus software products
Developing a proprietary eCommerce ecosystem with service-oriented architecture and React frontend shopping cart
Coordinating with marketing and sales to prioritize features in an Agile environment
Working on many high revenue generating projects such as the renew and upgrade product configurator, product recommendation tool, and cart upsell mechanisms
Implementing multivariate test experiences to optimize revenue streams
Using PHP, SQL, JavaScript, jQuery, React, HTML, LESS, Git, SSH and Photoshop

positions.title: Software Engineer
items: Developed responsive websites in Wordpress with custom backend features tailored to each client's Business
Implemented eCommerce platforms OpenCart and Magento with custom designs
Administered dedicated linux servers and web hosting for 400+ websites
Collaborated with local business owners to define technical requirements for website projects
Provided estimates, architected many custom solutions, and engineered reusable components to increase development efficiency
Between development tasks, I also provided technical support for clients and managed their payment processing
Used PHP, SQL, JavaScript, jQuery, HTML, SASS, SSH and Photoshop

positions.title: Software Engineer
items: Developed advanced document scanning software with optical character recognition
Developed automated document feeds integrated with content management and workflow applications
Supervised support ticket queue and provided hands-on technical support
Administered windows server environments and performed server maintenance
Coordinated departmental code relases and prepared contingency plans
Provided estimates, planning, engineering, unit testing and documentation for software application changes
Used VB.NET, VB6, SQL, JSON, XML and SOAP

helloworld.heading: Hello World
list: I wrote my first software application in VB6 at 14 years old, a chat bot that connected to Battle.net and IRC using Winsock and Telnet

hobbies.heading: Hobbies
list: Outdoor activities including Snowboarding, Rock Climbing, Hiking, Disc Golf, and Camping
Working on my codebase for Screeps, an MMO sandbox game for programmers
